title: NFC Wild Card Recap: You Like That? Cousins and Vikings top Saints, Seahawks beat Wentz-less Eagles (Football 1/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the NFC Wild Card games from Sunday. The guys start by breaking down the Vikings 26-20 overtime victory over the Saints (:10), focusing on Kirk Cousins' overcoming big-game demons, another controversial finish in New Orleans and Drew Brees' struggles. What's next for the Saints at quarterback? Can Minnesota compete with the 49ers in the divisional round? The Pick Six Superfriends answer it all as they discuss this wild game. Then, Will, Ryan, John and Sean analyze the Seahawks edging the Eagles 17-9 (37:10) to advance for a meeting with the Packers next week. Philadelphia lost Carson Wentz to a concussion early, but Josh McCown still deserves credit for his performance. The connection between Russell Wilson and rookie D.K. Metcalf proved to be the difference-maker in this cap to an extremely entering weekend of playoff football.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
